column3: Concept ACK on testing a call with parameters.\nThough, you're calling into the RPC while building the query, which is a bit funny (but not a problem in practice as there is a well-defiend execution order).
doesn't reflect practical usage sure, but was a quick way to demonstrate how it's done, and exercise it :)\n\nI was looking for an example and tests are the first place I look!
fair enough that's easy to understand, done
